comment: She just tells stories. She doesn't teach how to perform the tasks you are given. The textbooks are good but not referenced. The lectures are totally worthless. Reading the supplemental material is necessary to pass. I googled how to perform the tasks we were assigned.
Read slideshow only, no demonstration / teaching on the subject. Expect you to be an expert by just read the book .
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Very good professor. No tests in this class, so it was 100% project based. Really gets you thinking in systems and there are really no long answers so long as you give support for your assertions and elaborate heavily. I hope to have her again in the future.

The class is a hybrid class, so you meet once a week in class. prior to coming to class it is recommended that you attempt the module lecture and HW, which will make this class much easier. She will go over any HW problems you have and will explain harder concepts. If you do the work and show up to class you can expect to make an A.
